summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackCurlsmith Flawless Finish Hairspray is the perfect strong hold hairspray without crunchiness for finishing styles, controlling frizz and locking your style in place.
details: DetailsBenefitsA hairspray that helps control frizz, keeps curls in place all-day with high humidity protection.24 Hour hold even in high humidity*Helps control frizz, lock curls in place and keeps hair touchably soft89% agreed the product didn't leave their hair feeling sticky**Made without alcohol, providing long-lasting style*Based on third party testing vs control**Based on an independent study on people with wavy, curly, coily hairFeaturesStrong hold hairspray for curls - your perfect finishing touch.BEST FOR: Providing hold and long lasting styleFORMAT: MistHOLD LEVEL: 8- Strong holdColor-SafeMade without sulphates, silicones or drying alcoholsItem 2643528How To UseShake can well before use. Spray 7-9 inches away from hair and allow to set.IngredientsWater (Aqua / Eau), Dimethyl Ether, Polyurethane-14, Acrylates Copolymer, AMP-Acrylates Copolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Polysorbate 20, Ethylhexylglycerin, Panthenol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Geraniol, Linalool, Dimethyl Phenethyl Acetate, Linalyl Acetate, Citrus Aurantium (Orange) Peel Oil, Terpinolene.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake can well before use. Spray 7-9 inches away from hair and allow to set.
